ing: 1 tablespoon finely chopped green onions (white portion only)
1 teaspoon seasoned salt (such as Spice IslandsÂ® Beau Monde Seasoning)
des: "Everyone always asked my mother for this recipe. I can't eat chopped veggies without it. Works great as an appetizer to get people chomping down on veggies, or as part of a light summer meal."
ins: Stir sour cream, mayonnaise, parsley, green onion, dill, and seasoned salt together in a bowl until smooth.
